title: Cardistry
description: This is the first webpage I've ever built and published. It is about the astonishing art of cardistry which I am really fond of. It was built with plain HTML, CSS and JS. I applied some design principles and tried to make it look appealing. I also used JavaScript to make use of sticky navigation, as well as smooth scrolling and responsive menu bar.

title: Countries
description: I built this project with plain JavaScript. I used the RESTCountries api to fetch data about the countries and then displayed them with DOM manipulation.

title: Insurance
description: I built this webpage to practice for the midterm exam of "Principles of Insurance" subject for my university. I used React to build it and implemented state management, storing data in json file and organizing all my information that way. The project turned out to be too enjoyable and I smashed the exam

title: Movies
description: The idea of the page is quite simple. This is a movie app that has such functionalities like filtering, bookmarking, slider, and of course, fully responsive design. I am quite happy with how it turned out and had a lot of fun building it
